name: Fallen Angel
content: You were so good at that
Too many pieces to put back
You were the best by far
How did we end up like this
我们之间是如何结束的？
And even though who you are
我不能相信会变成这样
How does it feel to be a fallen angel
做只堕落天使是何感觉？
Your wings are lying on the ground
你那双翼折断在地平线上
How does it feel to be a fallen angel
做只堕落天使是何感觉？
Forever is a long way down
that thought I wanted to be
But everything is disappeared for me
to be a fallen angel of love
To the deepest part of love
destroy the life you built for us
你为了我们所憧憬的一生？
you played the part so well yeah
你这样出色地扮演好了的角色，是这样的
Was I the last to tell
我是这最后留下的人来诉说？
How does it feel to be a fallen angel
做只堕落天使是何感觉？
Your wings are lying on the ground
你那双翼折断在地平线上
How does it feel to be a fallen angel
做只堕落天使是何感觉？
Forever is a long way down
But everything is disappeared for me
to be a fallen angel of love
那个比空虚更颓废的事
那唯一值得让人悲痛心酸的事
Is the price of what love costs
you think its all in your hands
你会认为你是一切的主宰
Tell me how does it feel
How does it feel to be a fallen angel
做只堕落天使是何感觉？
Your wings are lying on the ground
你那双翼折断在地平线上
How does it feel to be a fallen angel
做只堕落天使是何感觉？
Forever is a long way down
你是我想拥有的那一切
But everything is disappeared for me So
How does it feel to be a fallen angel
